RESOURCE.NAME: Crawler PR
RESOURCE.COMMENT: GATE implementation of the Websphinx crawling API

PARAMETER.NAME: source
PARAMETER.COMMENT: corpus whose gate.SourceURL document features will be used to seed the crawl

PARAMETER.NAME: max
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Stop the crawl after saving this many pages (-1 to ignore)

PARAMETER.NAME: root
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The starting URL for the crawl

PARAMETER.NAME: maxPageSize
PARAMETER.COMMENT: max page size in kB (0 for no limit)

PARAMETER.NAME: depth
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The depth to which the crawl must proceed

PARAMETER.NAME: dfs
PARAMETER.COMMENT: true for depth-first search; false for breadth-first search

PARAMETER.NAME: userAgent
PARAMETER.COMMENT: HTTP User Agent to spoof (leave blank for default)

PARAMETER.NAME: domain
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The domain restriction for the crawl

PARAMETER.NAME: stopAfter
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Stop the crawl after fetching this many pages (-1 to ignore)

PARAMETER.NAME: keywords
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Pages that don't match at least one keyword will be dropped; leave empty to keep all pages

PARAMETER.NAME: convertXmlTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Convert other XML mime types to text/xml
